702187f-a.text:
Williamsbridge Road, east from Barnes Ave., showing the thoroughfare making a sharp bend in a southerly direction at Matthews Ave. The 2-story house on the left, between Barnes and Matthews Aves., has been demolished, and on its site now (1938) stands a 6-story apartment house. The property beyond the house is part of the Lorillard Spencer Estate.
About 1915.
James Suydan.
702187f-a.folder: Williamsbridge Road & Barnes Avenue, Bronx, NY
